Spring Social GitHub 1.0.0 Milestone 4 (August 30, 2013)
========================================================
Miscellaneous
  - Upgraded to Jackson 2
  - Extracted Spring Social GitHub module from core Spring Social project.
  - Renamed GitHubApi to GitHub.

Features
  - A more complete API binding.
  - An OAuth-enabled RestOperations is now exposed through the GitHub
    interface.
  - Support for SocialAuthenticationFilter, for tighter integration with
    Spring Security. (SOCIAL-232)
  - Support for simplified configuration with @EnableGitHub and an XML
    configuration namespace. (SOCIAL-292 and SOCIAL-293)


Refer to Spring Social's changelog for a history of the GitHub module
prior to it being extracted into its own project.
